Class milkyBeverageController

java.lang.Object
milkyBeverageController
public class milkyBeverageController extends Object
Class displaying options regarding milky beverages

  • Method Details

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)

      This method gets the current Order Object to ensure that the selected drink for this page is associated with the correct/current order

      Parameters:
      order - the current Order Object that comes from the previous "page"

    • handleBackToOrderMenuAction

      public void handleBackToOrderMenuAction()
      Handles the Back to Menu Button action.

      This method switches scene back to the menu page

    • pearlMilkTeaButtonAction

      public void pearlMilkTeaButtonAction()
      Button action to choose Pearl Milk Tea and load it into the current order, directing scene to order options

      This method switches scene to the order options page so that the user can make any modifications to the drink. This method will also call the orderOptionsController setOrder() function to pass through the current Order object.

    • honeyMilkTeaButtonAction

      public void honeyMilkTeaButtonAction()
      Button action to choose Honey Milk Tea and load it into the current order, directing scene to order options

      This method switches scene to the order options page so that the user can make any modifications to the drink. This method will also call the orderOptionsController setOrder() function to pass through the current Order object.
